meanings.sent1: The kindliest person in the neighborhood always helps others in need.
meanings.sent2: She received the kindliest smile from the old lady at the park.
meanings.sent3: The kindliest gesture of offering her seat to the tired stranger made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindliest nature shone through even in the toughest of times.
meanings.sent5: The kindliest act of donating food to the homeless touched many hearts.

meanings.definition: In a kind or generous manner
meanings.sent1: She spoke kindliest to her students, encouraging them to do their best.
meanings.sent2: He always treated his employees kindliest, earning their loyalty.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred kindliest as it enjoyed the warm sunshine on the windowsill.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed kindliest in the well-tended garden.
meanings.sent5: The old man smiled kindliest as he handed out candies to the children.
